summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Vahe Stepanian regarding an incoming cash alert related to the Haze Trust from JPM. It indicates internal communication within Deutsche Bank concerning financial transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in the communication regarding funds related to the Haze Trust.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is an associate at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc, who forwarded the incoming cash alert regarding the Haze Trust.

connections.description: Both Amanda Kirby and Vahe Stepanian are associates at Deutsche Bank, collaborating on financial matters related to the Haze Trust.

events.title: Incoming Cash Alert
events.description: An alert regarding incoming funds to the Haze Trust from JPM was communicated internally.

keyFacts: The document contains an email from Amanda Kirby regarding funds into the Haze Trust.
Vahe Stepanian forwarded an incoming cash alert related to the Haze Trust.
Both individuals work for Deutsche Bank and are involved in wealth management.
